alert.note: Alert for Bremerton and Vicinity; Hood Canal Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 25 at 9:01PM PST until February 26 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 4 inches. * WHERE...Western Kitsap and the lowlands of eastern Jefferson and Mason Counties, including Brinnon, Seabeck, and Shelton and Bremerton and vicinity, including Indianola, Bainbridge Island, Silverdale, and Port Orchard. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on very difficult travel. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A mix of rain and snow will start this afternoon and is expected to transition to all snow overnight into Sunday morning before transitioning back to rain and snow by late Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions in Washington state, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bremerton and Vicinity; Hood Canal Area
